description:
A brilliant if arrogant teen detective comes to town, determined to capture Kid the Phantom Thief. This turns the heat up for Kaito, especially since they`re classmates. In fact, Kaito becomes Suguru`s rival even out of uniform, leading to a "gentlemen`s bet" over which of them will go on a date with Aoko.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Great Detective Comes to Light
Meitantei wa Hakujitsu no Moto ni
